price: Ele privilegia, com Sua misericórdia, a quem quer. E Allah é Possuidor do magnífico favor.
arabic: يَخۡتَصُّ بِرَحۡمَتِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُۗ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yakhtaṣṣu biraḥmatihi man yashāu wal-lahu dhū al-faḍli al-ʿaẓīmi
